Deleting data

remove method deletes the given key from the cache.

Example

await cache.remove('one');

Usage in route

Here is an example showing how to use remove during delete operation on a resource.

@Delete(path: '/:id')
Future> delete(Context ctx) async {
  final String id = ctx.pathParams.id;
  final db = ctx.getInput(MongoDb);
  final bean = new BookBean(db);
  await bean.remove(id);
  cache.remove(id);
  final List books = await bean.getAll();
  return toJson(books);
}
>
